transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji sir kaise hain good afternoon.
Executive: Ha ye aapka number chalu nahi hai kya?
Customer: Sir chalu to hai mera number call hi lag rahi thi.
Executive: Call nahi lag rahi isliye to humne us direct call kiya na.
Customer: Wo nahi wo bhi number mera hi hai that's okay. Accha wo aapne us pe call kar liya mujhe pata hi nahi lagta aap call kar rahe ho mujhe.
Hm hm. Batao sir.
Customer: Kya problem hai pura catalog mera dikh nahi raha apna.
Executive: Kaha nahi dikh raha hai sir?
Customer: Yaha pe IndiaMART pe search karne ke baad.
Executive: Aap kaise search kar rahe hain thoda batayenge aap mujhe?
Customer: Bhai search karne aata hi nahi mere ko kya samajhte ho tum.
Executive: Sorry sir.
Customer: Search karna aata hai mere ko.
Executive: Wahi main puch rahi hu kaise search kar rahe hain aap. Category wise ya product wise search kar rahe hain?
Customer: Product wise.
Executive: Okay. Aap mujhe batayenge main bhi sath sath aapke sath search karungi to mujhe bhi dikhega ki kaise kaise aap search kar rahe hain.
Customer: Main whatsapp pe dalta hu aapko. WhatsApp pe.
[inaudible]
Customer: Hai ki nahi madam hai ki nahi?
Executive: Ha kar rahi hu main sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Student student Amravati.
Customer: Iske dur dur tak apna naam nahi dikhai de raha hai bekar hai bekar uska.
Executive: Then aapne student Amravati.
Customer: Student
[inaudible]
Customer: Amravati.
Customer: Yaha Amravati ke andar dala?
Executive: [inaudible]
Customer: 17 road master.
Executive: Check kar rahi hu main sir.
Customer: Aapke wo senior ko phone dedo.
Executive: Sir main check kar rahi hu wo bhi hai nahi idhar. Aapne Amravati ki location select kari hai na?
Customer: Hum Amravati ki nahi mere ko general mein search Amravati se search kar raha hu. General search kiya dikh nahi raha hai na.
Executive: Aap isme aapne app mein jo Amravati ki location aap waha se hataiye.
Customer: Amravati dal ke isliye Amravati dalna to pehla pehla to apna aana chahiye na Amravati. Ha bilkul aana chahiye aisa nahi hai. Ha fir. Ha to fir location kyu hataye rehne do na. Accha okay aap na app share kariye mere. Main aapko app sharing ka bhej rahi hu.
Customer: Aap app mein na three lines pe click kariye jo right hand side pe hai.
Executive: Uspe niche scroll karke aayenge na to customer support. Listing proper likhiye to listing proper likhiye. Then sir se baat karo kya hai to dekho. Udhar karo udhar karo thoda sa dekho kya problem hai sir. Done done done aapko nahi dikh raha hai main uske liye main aapko abhi usko tick karke aapko screen.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's catalog is not visible on IndiaMART.

- Wants his catalog to appear in general search.



Resolution:

- Executive is assisting with app sharing.

- Executive is checking the customer's account.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive will fix the issue and share screen.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, search, app, location, visibility
